summary:
Updated now for 0.126 and SweetFX 1.3

An ENB for every computer!

This is a Rebuild of ZHPenb for the new ENB dlls; including High and Extreme Quality presets (6 performance options), uses SweetFX as a proxy DLL for a secondary layer of post-processing, plenty of options to customize to your taste.
descriptionHtml:
[I][center]Retired dll\'s can be found at [URL=http://beautifulskyrim.yolasite.com/enb-binaries.php]Beautiful Skyrim[/URL][/center][/I]

[SIZE=3][center][I]If you like my work, my newest ENB can be found here: [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40588/?]z ENB[/URL] (It also has a High Performance Preset) ;)[/I][/center][/SIZE]

[center][IMG]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/4566/headermve.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[B][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=6][FONT=Georgia]Whats new in 2.0?[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]

[LIST][*]Performance Options: While ZHPenb v1.0-v1.5 were purely no frills high performance ENBs; v2.0 includes plenty of performance options.
[*]Still High-Performance: I tested the high-performance versions of this ENB on my laptop, I assure you, if a GT420M can run it, you can.
[*]SweetFX Injector: ZHPenb v2.0 uses SweetFX as a proxy DLL, which basically means FXAA + SMAA & more all in one; if you use 4x AA or lower, you can switch it off and use one of the SweetFX presets in the \"Options\" folder for a performance boost!
[*]Skyrim is Skyrim: I believe that the Weather and Lighting of Vanilla Skyrim is great, I have tried to keep most of that character intact.
[/LIST]

[center][URL=http://minus.com/lBWhiP79L56E4][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jBWhiP79L56E4.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/center]

[center]Videos by Hodilton![/center]

[center][youtube]rJbtB6A3sdo[/youtube][youtube]8pnyLRVE3_0[/youtube][/center]

[B][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=6][FONT=Georgia]Installation:[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]

[LIST][*]If this is the first time you are installing an ENB; please watch the video above.
[*]If you hate watching videos, hate youtube, hate Hodilton, have a bandwidth limit, or are super-intelligent and realized this enb has more specific instructions; read below.
[*]First Download, extract and copy the [url=http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0126.htm]ENB 0.126[/url] files to your Skyrim folder. (If you are confused about Injector/Wrapper, read the next section)
[*]Download and extract this ENBs files anywhere. (Just NOT Skyrims\' folder)
[*]First Copy the \'Core Files\' folder files to Skyrim\'s folder. (Overwrite)
[*]Then choose a pefrormance preset from the folder called \"Select your Pefrormance\"; and copy it to Skyrim\'s folder (Overwrite)
[*]There are a lot of optional files inside the \"Options\" folders that are optional.. really. Just copy what you need to Skyrim\'s folder (Overwrite)
[/LIST]

[B][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=6][FONT=Georgia]Injector/Wrapper, which one to use?[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]

You always use the wrapper version of ENB unless you have one of the problems below with it.

[LIST][*]Huge frame-rate drop, probably means you have a multi-GPU setup and Skyrim is using the wrong GPU (Optimus laptops/ATI equivalent, dunno what its called)
[*]Black clouds (Not at night), blue grass, backwards flying dragons (Oh wait, thats normal in Skyrim); basically if something seems wrong to you, you can check if using the injector fixes it.
[*]ENB not working at all. (No text in the top-left corner when Skyrim starts)
[*]Finally if you have decided to use the injector version, make sure you delete d3d9.dll from Skyrim\'s folder; and yes it has to be running for ENB to detect the game when Skyrim starts. (Also anti-viruses may interfere with the injector, watch out for that)
[/LIST]

[center][IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/8465/3rdselect.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[SIZE=5][B][COLOR=#7f7f7f][FONT=Georgia]My game looks nothing like your Screenshots!![/FONT][/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]

The following mods should NOT be active with this ENB (The game wont go bonkers, it just wont look the same)

[LIST][*]Realistic Lighting with Customization (RL)
[*]Revamped Exterior Fog
[*]Climates of Tamriel (CoT) - May do a CoT specific version later.
[*]Ultra Realistic World Lighting (URWL)
[*]Anything else that modifies lighting/weather settings in Skyrim.
[/LIST]

[center][IMG]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/92/2ndselect.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[B][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=6][FONT=Georgia]Recommended Mods:[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]

[B][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia]No/Low FPS drop:[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[LIST][*][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/85]Enhanced Night Skyrim[/URL]
[*][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4910]Dramatic Clouds[/URL]
[*][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916]Lanterns of Skyrim - All In One[/URL]
[*][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268]WATER - Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux[/URL]
[*][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/736]Interior and Dungeon Fog Remover[/URL] (Included, please endorse).
[*][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12454]Dark Dungeons for ENB[/URL] (Included, please endorse).
[*][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24364]AOF HD Tree LODs[/URL].
[/LIST]

[B][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia]Moderate/High FPS drop:[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[LIST][*][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25370]SkyRealism - Grass[/URL]. (Looks Incredible)
[*][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4834]High Quality LODs[/URL].
[/LIST]

[center][IMG]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/6323/creditsp.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[COLOR=#7f7f7f][center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center][/COLOR]
[center][I]Skyrim
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40588/?]z-ENB[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15551]Zoners High-Performance ENB[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26744]Zoners High-Performance ENB 2_0[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26080]Zoners Sky-Real ENB[/URL] 
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14869]Zoners RL and Imaginator Settings[/URL] 
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14946]Solitide Capital City Overhaul[/URL] 

Fallout 3
[URL=http://fallout3.nexusmods.com/mods/18514/]The ENB of the Apocalyspe[/URL]

Fallout New Vegas
[URL=http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/mods/50782/?]The ENB of the Apocalyspe - New Vegas[/URL]

Dragon Age: Origins
[URL=http://dragonage.nexusmods.com/mods/3653]Dragon Age - Lighting Enhanced[/URL][/I]
[/center]
